name: summer-school-website
description: Summer School on Modular Forms website

scripts.dev:open: sh -c 'python3 -m http.server 5173 --bind 127.0.0.1 & pid=$!; sleep 1; open http://127.0.0.1:5173; wait $pid'
scripts.dev:chrome: sh -c 'python3 -m http.server 5173 --bind 127.0.0.1 & pid=$!; sleep 1; open -a "Google Chrome" http://127.0.0.1:5173; wait $pid'
